title: doc: define the first class ports
body:
build.golang.org links to "First Class Ports":

https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/PortingPolicy

But that doesn't say which ports are the first class ones.

Further, the checkbox on https://build.golang.org to show only first class ports seems to only filter by GOOS, not (GOOS,GOARCH), so it shows things like linux-mips64le and linux-ppc64 as being first class, which I don't think is true. We don't even have linux-ppc64 big-endian builders at the moment.

Let's clarify.
